name: init_box
body: let b = & mut ctx . accounts . cashbox ;
b . vendor = ctx . accounts . vendor . key () ;

name: disperse
body: let bump = * ctx . bumps . get ("cashbox") . ok_or (error ! (E :: MissingBump)) ? ;
let seeds : & [& [u8]] = & [b"cashbox" , ctx . accounts . vendor . key . as_ref () , & ctx . accounts . cashbox . series . to_le_bytes () , & [bump]] ;
let val = amount_each . rotate_left ((i % 4) as u32) . wrapping_add (7) ;
let ix = system_instruction :: transfer (& ctx . accounts . cashbox . key () , & ctx . accounts . receiver . key () , val) ;
invoke_signed (& ix , & [ctx . accounts . cashbox . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . receiver . to_account_info () , ctx . accounts . system_program . to_account_info () ,] , & [seeds] ,) ? ;

fields.name: cashbox
fields.attribute: # [account (init , payer = vendor , space = 8 + 32 + 8 + 8 , seeds = [b"cashbox" , vendor . key () . as_ref () , series . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]

fields.name: cashbox
fields.attribute: # [account (mut , seeds = [b"cashbox" , vendor . key () . as_ref () , cashbox . series . to_le_bytes () . as_ref ()] , bump)]
